trans-unit.source: Abstract class that describes a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] drawing.
trans-unit.target: Abstrakt klasse som beskriver en [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] tegning.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited by your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen kan arves av koden.

trans-unit.source: Drawing objects are light-weight objects that enable you to add geometric shapes, images, text, and media to an application.
trans-unit.target: Tegning objekter er lett objekter som gjør det mulig å legge til geometrisk former, bilder, tekst og media i en applikasjon.

trans-unit.source: Drawing objects are considered light-weight because they do not provide support for [Layout](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [Input Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and focus.
trans-unit.target: Tegneobjekter regnes lett fordi de ikke gir støtte for [oppsettet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), [inndataene oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), og fokus.

trans-unit.source: Because of their performance benefits, drawings are ideal for backgrounds and clip art.
trans-unit.target: Tegninger er ideelle for spillerbakgrunner og opprette for fremtidig på grunn av fordelene ytelse.

trans-unit.source: You also use drawings when programming at the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual> level.
trans-unit.target: Du også bruke tegninger når programming på den <xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>nivå.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Visual>

trans-unit.source: Because they inherit from the <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> class, Drawing objects provide additional features that make them useful for describing clip art and backgrounds: they can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only, and made thread-safe.
trans-unit.target: Fordi de arve fra den <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>klassen tegneobjekter gir flere funksjoner som gjør dem nyttig for å beskrive klipp art og spillerbakgrunner: de kan er deklarert som delt mellom flere objekter som skrivebeskyttet, og gjort sikker.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the different features provided by <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om de ulike funksjonene som er angitt av <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter, se den [oversikt over Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: There are different types of Drawing objects for different types of content: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>.
trans-unit.target: Det finnes flere typer tegneobjekter for forskjellige typer innhold: <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing>, og <xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GlyphRunDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Media.VideoDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingGroup> </xref:System.Windows.Media.ImageDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features A Drawing is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object.
trans-unit.target: Freezable funksjoner en tegning er en type <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](../Topic/Freezable%20Objects%20Overview.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>Funksjoner, for eksempel fryse og kloning, kan du se den [oversikt over Freezable](../Topic/Freezable%20Objects%20Overview.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Gets the axis-aligned bounds of the drawing's contents.
trans-unit.target: Henter grensene akse justert for den tegne innholdet.

trans-unit.source: The axis-aligned bounds of the drawing's contents.
trans-unit.target: Akse justert grensene for den tegne innholdet.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> blir <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen var <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.
